content: this pattern is available for free on my blog it was released in 4 parts during a make-a-long february 14th - part 1 1 february 21nd - part 2 2 february 28th - part 3 3 march 6th - part 4 4 final part the pdf pattern for sale here on ravelry includes the entire pattern in one go much easier than following the separate parts and you ll be supporting an independent designer upon purchase you ll get acces to 4 files *the cosy moments shawl pattern* 1x english 1x dutch *the minis version * same shawl but written for using a mini skein fade pack or leftover yarn 1x english 1x dutch **cosy moments shawl introduction** the cosy moments shawl is a knitting pattern for a lace shawl featuring eight different lace patterns it s a half-round shawl also called semi-circle or half-pi shawl and will be knit flat on circular knitting needles this mal is lovingly sponsored by scheepjes the best thing about lace knitting is that it s so relaxing it demands your full attention so you have no space to think about anything else during this knitting project take some time for yourself make sure no one will distract you brew yourself a cuppa of your favourite tea a sparkly beverage will do nicely as well and treat yourself to a cosy moment with your shawl **skill level** this pattern is aimed at intermediate knitters so you will need to have knit a couple of projects before i ll share some extra tips and tricks in the videos to make this project as carefree as possible **finished size** scheepjes whirl the finished size of the shawl is 135cm from tip to tip along the straight edge and 60cm deep in the middle this size applies when knitting with scheepjes whirl scheepjes whirligig 180cm wide and 90cm deep minis version added february 9th 129cm wide and 56cm deep **yarn** for the cosy moments shawl i ve used the beautiful gradient yarn scheepjes whirl alternatively you can use scheepjes whirligig dk version to get an even bigger shawl for both yarns 1 cake will be
